===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|りょ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=りょ}} {{m|zh|旅|tr=ljo<sup>X</sup>||a military unit of 500 men; to go [on a sortie; on a trip or journey]}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|りょ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|りょ}}

# in ancient China, a [[military]] [[unit]] of 500 [[soldier]]s
# one of the [[I Ching]] [[hexagram]]s: [[sojourning]] ([[w:List_of_hexagrams_of_the_I_Ching#Hexagram_56|''I Ching hexagram interpretation on Wikipedia here'']])

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|prefix|りょ}}

# a [[trip]], a [[journey]], [[travel]]

=====Usage notes=====
The prefix usage only ever appears in kanji compounds.

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|たび}}
{{IPAchar|/tabi<sub>1</sub>/}} → {{IPAchar|/tabi/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=たび}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Appears in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed no earlier than 759 and one of the oldest extant texts in the Japanese language.

May be cognate with {{m|ja|度|tr=tabi||the time when something happens}}; both terms have the same pitch accent, the same ancient vowel values, and some semantic overlap.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|たび|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たび}}

# a [[journey]]; [[travel]]
#* '''1694''', 松尾芭蕉 [[w:Matsuo Bashō|Matsuo Bashō]]
#*: {{ja-usex|'''旅'''に病んで夢は枯野をかけ廻る。|'''たび''' に やんで ゆめ は かれの を かけめぐる。|Anxious to go '''journeying''', my dreams run through the desolate fields.}}
#*: {{ja-usex|不思議な'''旅'''が始まるぜ！|ふしぎ な '''たび''' が はじまる ぜ！|A strange '''journey''' is about to begin!}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=たび|archaic}} a [[temporary]] [[time]] spent in a place
# {{qualifier|more specifically}} a [[place]] where a {{m|ja|神輿|tr=mikoshi||portable shrine}} spends a [[temporary]] [[time]] outside of the {{m|ja|本宮|tr=hongū||main shrine building}} during a {{m|ja|祭り|tr=matsuri||festival}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|たび|tr=intrans}}

# to [[travel]], to [[go]] on a [[journey]] or [[trip]]

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|たび}}
